Title: Testing code
Topic: perl

=encoding utf8

=head2 Code

This C<perl> section has syntax highlighted and does not overflow

=begin perl

# Syntax-highlighted code
my $x = 1_00_000 ** $::xyzzy;
my $str = "foobar";

=end perl

This other C<code> is verbatim and does not overflow

	my $x = 1_00_000 ** $::xyzzy;
        my $str = "foobar";

=head2 Syntax-highlighted code

A C<perl> section can do syntax highlighting

=begin perl

# Syntax-highlighted code
my $x = 1_00_000 ** $::xyzzy;
my $long_str = "";

=end perl

=head2 Verbatim block code

Verbatim text

	my $x = 1_00_000 ** $::xyzzy;
	my $long_str = "";

=cut
